name: Adventuresmith
tagline: Generate tabletop RPG nonsense at the push of a button! (on Android)
body:
# Adventuresmith

This is an Android app for randomly generating elements for tabletop RPGs (names, spells,
items, monsters, characters, alien worlds, etc). 

I'm not planning to turn this into a general-purpose random table engine. But, I am 
interested in complicated random generation involving multiple dice, interrelated 
results from multiple tables, etc.

Bugs? Feature Requests? You can provide feedback here: https://github.com/stevesea/Adventuresmith/issues

## Downloads (Beta)

I haven't published the app on Google Play yet. To get a copy of the application, follow this link: https://betas.to/guJ4ZNqt

That link will take you to a sign up page where you enter your email. You'll receive an email with a
link to download the Crashlytics Beta app. (you'll need to open the link on your Android phone, using
Chrome as your browser)

Once Beta is installed, it'll give you an interface to download Adventuresmith. Beta will download the 
app and then it should take you to the typical APK install screen where you can choose whether to accept the
install and be shown the permissions the app is requesting.

As I fix bugs and implement features, you'll be notified when i publish new beta versions and can choose to 
install them or not.
